eas_text: A civil authority has issued A MISSING AND ENDANGERED PERSON ALERT for the following counties or areas: Maricopa, AZ; at 07:03 PM ON DEC 26, 2025 Effective until 05:03 AM DEC 27, 2025. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. A Turquoise Alert has been issued for Arizona. Maricopa County Sheriff is looking for endangered 13-year-old female Raylynn Phillips, 5 feet 2, 117 pounds, brown hair, brown eyes, last seen at 10:30 AM on near 182nd Avenue and West Puget Avenue., wearing pink pants, long black t-shirt, brown purse with sunflowers and skulls. Contact 911 with any information or sighting. If you have contact with the missing person. please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
